es.csic.iiia.nsm.strategy.simon.others

Class ExplicitSIMONOperators

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.csic.iiia.nsm.strategy.simon.others.ExplicitSIMONOperators

  • public class ExplicitSIMONOperators
extends java.lang.Object
    The operators that the SIMON strategy uses to perform norm synthesis
    Author:
    "Javier Morales (jmorales@iiia.csic.es)"

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activate(Norm norm)
      Activates a given norm in the normative network, resets its utility and adds the norm to the norm reasoner.
      void add(Norm norm)
      Adds a norm to the normative network (if the normative network does not contain it yet) and activates it by setting its state to active in the normative network
      void create(Conflict conflict, Goal goal)
      Creates norms to regulate a given conflict that the norm synthesis machine has perceived in the scenario.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExplicitSIMONOperators

        public ExplicitSIMONOperators(ExplicitSIMONStrategy strategy,
                              NormReasoner normReasoner,
                              NormSynthesisMachine nsm)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        strategy - the SIMON norm synthesis strategy
        normReasoner - the norm reasoner, to reason about norm applicability and compliance
        nsm - the norm synthesis machine

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public void create(Conflict conflict,
                   Goal goal)
        Creates norms to regulate a given conflict that the norm synthesis machine has perceived in the scenario. The conflict is detected in terms of a system goal
        Parameters:
        conflict - the perceived conflict
        goal - the goal with respect to which the conflict has arisen
        See Also:
        Conflict, Goal

      • add

        public void add(Norm norm)
        Adds a norm to the normative network (if the normative network does not contain it yet) and activates it by setting its state to active in the normative network
        Parameters:
        norm - the norm to add

      • activate

        public void activate(Norm norm)
        Activates a given norm in the normative network, resets its utility and adds the norm to the norm reasoner. Thus, the strategy will take the norm into account to compute norm applicability and compliance
        Parameters:
        norm - the norm to activate

      • deactivate

        public void deactivate(Norm norm)
        Deactivates a given norm in the normative network and removes it from the norm reasoner. Thus, the strategy will not take the norm into account to compute norm applicability and compliance
        Parameters:
        norm - the norm to deactivate

      • generalise

        public void generalise(Norm child,
                       Norm parent)
        Generalises a child norm to a parent norm
        Parameters:
        child - the child norm
        parent - the parent norm

      • specialise

        public void specialise(Norm norm,
                       java.util.List<Norm> children)
        Specialises a norm in the normative network
        Parameters:
        norm - the norm to specialise
        children - the children into which to specialise the norm
